metadata.title: CVE-2022-3031 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versions before15.1.6, all versions starting from 15.2 before 15.2.4, all versionsstarting from 15.3 before 15.3.2. It may be possible for an attacker toguess a user's password by brute force by sending crafted requests to aspecific endpoint, even if the victim user has 2FA enabled on theiraccount.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
